derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : earlier spelling and pronunciation of ballad

encyclopedia.content: 1. A verse form usually consisting of three stanzas of eight or ten lines each along with a brief envoy, with all three stanzas and the envoy ending in the same one-line refrain. 三解韵格：一种诗歌形式，通常由三个八至十行的诗节组成，每一行都有一个简短的结尾诗节，所有三个诗节和结尾诗节都以同样的一行迭句结尾 2. Music A composition, usually for the piano, having the romantic or dramatic quality of a

means.word_mean: 1. a poem consisting of 3 stanzas and an envoy
